scripts.generate-api-client: rm -rf src/generated-sources/openapi; openapi-generator-cli generate -i ../sechub-openapi/src/main/resources/openapi.yaml -o src/generated-sources/openapi -g typescript-fetch --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,npmVersion=10.8.3
scripts.generate-compile-api-client: rm -rf src/generated-sources/openapi; openapi-generator-cli generate -i ../sechub-openapi/src/main/resources/openapi.yaml -o src/generated-sources/openapi -g typescript-fetch --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,npmVersion=10.8.3 && tsc
